RandomEncounter.KeybindHint: When set, will trigger the random encounters for the scene regardless of when time was set
RandomEncounter.button.name: Configure Random Encounters
RandomEncounter.button.label: Configure
RandomEncounter.intro: To Create a new Random Encounter, click the Add Encounter button at the bottom, Give it a name, Select a scene, Set how often to roll the table (optional), Set Chance for rolling the table (optional), Create or Link to a RollTable
RandomEncounter.name.label: Encounter Name
RandomEncounter.scene.label: Scene
RandomEncounter.time.label: Tigger Encounter Time in minutes (optional)
RandomEncounter.chance.label: Dice Formula (optional)
RandomEncounter.rolltable.label: RollTable
RandomEncounter.SaveNameError: You must provide an Encounter Name
